note.p: Birth: Myddelton Square, Islington, England (05 November 1831)
Education: University College, London. MB (1854), MD (1855)

Career: Physician, London Fever Hospital (1861-1868); general practitioner; Assistant Physician, Hospital for Sick Children, Great Ormond Street; Inspector (1869), then Medical Officer, Local Government Board (1879-1892); a fund in his memory was used to found Buchanan Medal (Royal Society)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1895-1896 vol 59 pp xli-xliii signed by R T T
